title: Mini GTA San Andreas (for samp)
description:
This is a mini/light version of GTA San Andreas, modified for SA-MP* (San Andreas Multiplayer).

SA-MP is a modification for GTA San Andreas which allows you to play GTA SA online (Multiplayer) for free. Its a good modification for GTA SA but the gameplay in SA-MP lags more as compared GTA SA single player, because GTA SA is designed to be played offline not online. So i removed some audio files, textures(images) and some extra files of the game to make it smaller in size and lighter so that the SA-MP runs smoother.



System Requirements
--------------------------------------------------------
CPU: Pentium 4 1.8GHz / Athlon XP 1800+

GPU: GeForce 6600 / Radeon 9500 Pro

RAM: 384 MB

OS: Windows Xp 32bit

DirectX: Direct X 9

Disk Space: 4.07 GB (741 MB on NTFS)
--------------------------------------------------------


IMPORTANT NOTE: THIS GAME CAN ONLY BE PLAYED ONLINE (SA-MP) AND IT MAY OR MAY NOT WORK FOR YOU. DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK.



Download the latest version of SA-MP from http://sa-mp.com/

*Read more about SA-MP at http://wiki.sa-mp.com/
